author: Charles Creitz
title: Crenshaw vows Americans are 'going to find somebody to sue' over coronavirus pandemic
description: Rep. Dan Crenshaw, R-Texas, and Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., joined "Hannity" Monday night to discuss their bill that would allow Americans to sue China's government for damages related to the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
